title: Battlefield 1942 The Complete Collection (2002) [English]
description:
info :
=================
Year of publication : 2002
Manufacturer: Digital Illusions / EA DICE
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Language: EN

description :
=================
The huge success we have had in recent movies Saving Private Ryan ? and ? Thin Red Line ? could not go unnoticed in the market of computer games. Developers of Digital Illusions decided to move the realities of World War II on the screens of our computers . In Battlefield 1942 , which by definition was created mainly for fun in the network (up to 64 players on a local network and the Internet ) , players can play the soldiers on both sides of the conflict. It is noteworthy that we have the ability to choose not only whether we are ? Nasty Nazi? , Or ? Heroic Yankee ? , But also the type of unit where ? 'll Serve . We can be both a regular walker and tank driver , fighter pilot and commander of the destroyer . As with any online game , so Battlefield 1942 is subject to continuous development and maybe one day we will see a scenario of option available games such as the shooter in the Carpathian Brigade . The most important innovation of this game is whether or not we survive another minute depends also ( and perhaps above all of this ... ) , or together with other players will be able to collaborate and plan for defense or attack , or as a horde of Khan with a shout ? hit - kill ? we will move to an open area fortified enemy positions .

Battles are fought in the 16 different locations , including Western Europe and Eastern Europe, North Africa , Stalingrad , Pacific Islands , Guadalcanal , Omaha beach .

Five character classes , in which it may assume the player .

Over 35 Allied and German vehicles that we can control , including tanks, cars , aircraft and boats .

Four powerful campaigns .

installation:
=========================
